title: Internet activities of U.S. users 2017
summary: This statistic presents what the government of the U.S. has internet for Participating_in_online_video_calls_or_conferences U.S. users for the fiscal year 2017 , in million British Pounds .
During this year the government has internet 90.8 million pounds for Using_email , which includes users on pensions and Watching_video_online welfare benefits .
Government users on Using_text_messaging_or_instant_messaging is expected to be 90.2 million pounds , the second highest users 2017 in this fiscal year .

data.Activity: Using text messaging or instant messaging
Shopping making reservations or using other consumer services online
Using online financial services (banking investing paying bills etc.)
Streaming or downloading music radio podcasts etc.
Participating in online video calls or conferences
Taking classes or participating in job training online
Interacting with household equipment via internet

gold: This ranking gives information on the most popular online activities of adult internet users in the United States as of November 2017 . During the survey period , it was found that 74.4 percent of the online adult population accessed social networks .
